getChallengeStakes(uint256).details: Get all stakes for a challenge

getTotalLockedByToken(address,address).details: Get total locked amount for user by token

lockStake(address,address,uint256,uint25.details: Lock ERC20 token stakes for a challenge Called by ChallengeFactory when user joins challenge

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

releaseStakes(uint256,address[]).details: Release locked stakes (e.g., if challenge is cancelled) Returns tokens to users

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferStake(address,address,address,ui.details: Transfer stakes from loser to winner Called by ChallengeFactory when challenge is resolved
